description: Kyle Quinn is about to learn that gambling does it pay. Seems as if he has bet and lost, and now Johnny Torque is going to teach him a lesson... a hard lesson. Sometimes your mouth writes a check that your ass has to cash. But it does help that, luckily, that doesn't sound like such a bad time to Kyle. Actually Johnny might be teaching him the wrong lesson.Enjoy!
title: You Bet Your Balls
